title: io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.CurrentVertxRequest.getCurrent() is null on VertxMeterBinderUndertowServletFilter.doFilter(VertxMeterBinderUndertowServletFilter.java:31)

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
